metadata.name: Suspicious RunAs-Like Flag Combination
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious command line flags that let the user set a target user and command as e.g. seen in PsExec-like tools

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u system ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --user system ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u nt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u "nt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u \'nt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --system ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u administrator '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c "cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c "powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --command cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --command powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c whoami')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c wscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c cscript'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious command line flags that let the user set a target user and command as e.g. seen in PsExec-like tools
